x_symbol.description: Assign a function to handle events which occur on either table and access corresponding TDs.

par.name: fn
par.note: Callback function, called when sEvent occurs on a TD in either table. fn(td1, td2) td1 - the TD which received the event. td2 - the corresponding TD in the other table.
